docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, March 13.--President Roosevelt approved today raising the American Legation at Panama to an embassy and sent to the Senate the name of William Dawson of Minnesota, now Minister to Uruguay, to be the first Ambassador.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 13.--President Roosevelt approved today raising the American Legation at Panama to an embassy and sent to the Senate the name of William Dawson of Minnesota, now Minister to Uruguay, to be the first Ambassador.
